title: Press the Attack
body: Can you just nerf this already? It ruins the game. 12% bonus damage from all sources????? You hotfixed Galio, why cant you hotfix this. Its a big enough problem so...

replies.body: I liked the original idea they had for it, which was pretty much fervor of battle but it stacked endlessly. It sounds op at first but when you look at the other runes it really isn't that bad. If it was like 4-6 ad per stack for melee and 3-5 per stack for ranged it doesn't sound too overpowered. Plus champions like jax and tryndamere would benefit perfectly from it.
That's exactly what i think. Rather than 3 autos + Tristana E = Dead. The original is what and ADC should be; DPS, not burst.
